name: ALFAcoins for WooCommerce
author: alfacoins

sections.description:
Accept all major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, TRC-20 & ERC-20 Tether, TRX, Litecoin, XRP with ALFAcoins plugin for WooCommerce.

ALFAcoins features:

  • Select preferred cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB, XRP, USDC, DOGE, TRX, DOT, BCH, LTC, DAI, ATOM, XLM, DASH) and start accepting cryptocurrency.
  • Follow a straightforward set-up process, no technical expertise needed: guide.
  • Every transaction is displayed with an equivalent of your preferred fiat currency.
  • Automate withdrawals by setting up preferred period and amount.
  • Protect your account with a two-factor authentication (2FA) feature.
  • Check your transactions’ history, statuses and fees. Export data and reports on the go.

Why ALFAcoins?

  • Hassle free account opening process, application review guaranteed within 24 hours.
  • Submit your queries about integration, account or transaction management to our support team.
  • Open your e-shop to customers worldwide preferring crypto payments.
  • Real-time competitive cryptocurrency exchange rates.
  • Financial reports about incoming and outgoing operations.
  • Secure storage and instant transfers of your crypto assets.

Join the digital payment revolution and expand your WooCommerce store’s potential with ALFAcoins. Embrace the opportunities of cryptocurrency and set your business up for success.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.3.1 or greater
  • WooCommerce 2.4.10 or greater
  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • OpenSSL Must be compiled with PHP

Automatic Installation

Log into your WordPress dashboard and go to Plugins > Add New.

Search for “ALFAcoins for WooCommerce” and click “Install Now”

Manual Installation

Download the plugin and upload it to your webserver via the directions found at the WordPress codex.
sections.changelog:
1.1 – 2024-02-13

Updated screenshots

1.0 – 2024-02-09

  • New cryptocurrency supported: USDT, USDC, DAI, Binance Smartchain, Tron, Polkadot, Cosmos, Cardano, Dogecoin
  • Added support for WooCommerce Checkout Block
  • Added an ability to select available crypto icons on checkout page

0.10 – 2019-09-16

Fix order status change process when customer has paid more than needed.

0.9 – 2019-06-20

Added “Hide warning” option

0.8 – 2019-01-28

New logo for Litecoin, name fixes: Ripple to XRP

0.7 – 2018-07-18

Cryptocurrency Ripple rebrands to XRP

0.6 – 2018-06-19

Litecoin Testnet support has been added for development and testing.

0.5 – 2018-04-02

  • Now you can create orders in any currency (not only in USD / EUR / …)

0.4 – 2018-02-21

  • New cryptocurrencies added: Bitcoin Cash, Dash and Ripple

0.3 – 2017-01-27

  • Settings form sanitize
  • IPN POST variables sanitize

0.2 – 2017-01-25

  • New icon
  • Order description
  • Customer Email & Name support for IPN

0.1 – 2017-01-22

  • Initial version
sections.screenshots:
1. The cart page features a "Proceed to Checkout" button adorned with icons.

  2. Upon selection, this is the appearance of the chosen payment option.

  3. This is the ALFAcoins invoice page to which a customer will be directed during checkout after choosing this plugin's payment method.

  4. Following the customer's payment, they will receive a prompt to return to your site.

  5. The checkout will clearly denote that the payment was made using cryptocurrency.

  6. The plugin's settings page.

  7. The option to choose from available cryptocurrency icons on the checkout page.
sections.reviews:
Crypto payment solutions

By nelfabre1980 on February 13, 2024

We're satisfied with the use of this plugin. Installation was easy, no technical issues arose. Now we can accept payments without any hassle. Thank you, Alfacoins, for the excellent product!

It just works excellent!

By myestate on February 12, 2024

The ALFAcoins for WooCommerce plugin is a game-changer. Its user-friendly interface and impressive features make it a joy to use. The recent update works flawlessly, reflecting the team’s commitment to continual improvement. The responsive and helpful development team is a standout, always ready to assist. I highly recommend this plugin for its efficiency and the excellent customer service provided by the team.

Excellent payment system

By vakltl on February 12, 2024

A very convenient plugin for accepting payments in cryptocurrency. And the service itself impresses with its ease of operation, thoughtful design and ease of configuration.
